sentences.en: " Let us reasonably Banish care And just be friends , enjoying nature. "
sentences.cn: 理会是非 遣, 性达形迹忘.

sentences.en: Banish all troubles from your mind.
sentences.cn: 忘却你心中所有烦恼吧.

sentences.en: Banish that thought from your mind.
Do you really care for me enough, then to banish those chill fancies?
sentences.cn: 那么,你真是那么关心我,足以驱除那些吓人的幻景 吗 ?

sentences.en: He decided to banish the thought.
He tried to banish gloom from his thought.
sentences.cn: 他试图驱除心中的忧愁.

sentences.en: He wanted to banish this business from his mind, yet it obsessed him.
sentences.cn: 那点别扭劲儿又忽然回来了.不愿再思索, 可是心中堵得慌.

sentences.en: His assuring words helped to banish my fear.
sentences.cn: 他的安慰话帮我排除了恐惧.

sentences.en: If we could banish all such preconceptions when we read, that would be an admirable beginning.
sentences.cn: 假如我们在阅读时,能排除一切这类先入之见, 那将是令人羡慕的良好开端.

sentences.en: The doctor advised her to banish fear and anxiety.
sentences.cn: 医生劝她消除恐惧和忧虑.

sentences.en: The King wanted to stop his wages; he even wanted to banish him, but I interfered.
sentences.cn: 国王想把他停职罢俸; 他甚至于还想把他发配充军呢, 但是我出来说情了.

sentences.en: They tried to banish him from politics.
sentences.cn: 他们试图把他逐出政界。

sentences.en: They used force to banish the natives from the more fertile land.
sentences.cn: 他们使用武力把土著居民驱逐出了比较肥沃的土地。

sentences.en: You will banish these ghastly thoughts.
sentences.cn: 你要去掉这些可怕的念头.

sentences.en: Zeus: I banish you to the darkest pits of Tartarus!
sentences.cn: 宙斯: 我要让你们在冥界暗无天日的深渊消亡.

trans.tran_cn: 流放, 驱逐, 消除
trans.tran_en: to not allow someone or something to stay in a particular place
